Hpte; by Lo::d T/Abernon,I have read Lord Rhondda's memorandum of the 17th December (War Cabinet Paper GoT, 3028) on the output of beer for the quarter commencing on the let January, and I desire to say that I am in full accord with Lord Rhondaafs proposal.(Sgd) DrAbernon.Central Control Board(Liquor Traffic),19th December, 1917.
